channel.title: Promoting and marketing a WordPress plugin?
channel.description:
I have a question for any WordPress experts.
Saber Feedback has an underused, attention-starved WordPress plugin. We're changing that, and will soon update it.
Is there a playbook for promoting and marketing a WordPress plugin? Any tips or pointers on what we should do?
